summary:
ENB setting. This setting corresponds to ENB v0.266
It is the Photoreal settings and ENB arrangement for showing scenery as a character finely.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Thank you very much viewing this mod![/size]

[size=5][color=lightblue][u]Please download the [url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.html]ENB v0.266[/url] first.[/u][/color][/size]

[img]https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-UUCVNxL37Kk/U8d7r-7GM1I/AAAAAAAABB8/Y3WEO9O2UHc/w920-h518-no/ScreenShot5559.jpg[/img]



[color=#00ff00][size=6][b]Video[/b][/size][/color]

[youtube]UJ5RkWq7TI8[/youtube] [youtube]Nver8yfVsX4[/youtube]
[youtube]iy8GCA5Inn0[/youtube] [youtube]ZpRten5DYcY[/youtube]




[color=#00ff00][size=6][b]Concept and Features[/b][/size][/color]

[size=3]1.the arrangement which thought performance as important as it is realistic.
2.A setup where a character looks beautifully.
3.Atmosphere is increased in the time zone of sunrise and sunset using a color filter.[/size]

[img]https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-r0v10zju6yE/U8d7r-3PBnI/AAAAAAAABBs/qjcrazLTQUE/w920-h518-no/ScreenShot5365.jpg[/img]



[color=#00ff00][size=6][b]Installation[/b][/size][/color]

1.Copy the [color=yellow][u]d3d9.dll and enbhost[/u][/color] files of ENB v0.266 to your Skyrim folder.
2.Copy and paste to your Skyrim folder with manual operation about all the files in a AIR ENB folder.

3.Edit your [color=yellow]enblocal.ini[/color] and set the following values:
[size=4][MEMORY]
[color=yellow]ReservedMemorySizeMb=[/color][color=red]XXXX[/color] --- Please input the amount of RAM which you are reserving.(Default is 1024.)
[color=yellow]VideoMemorySizeMb=[/color][color=red]XXXX[/color] --- Please input the amount of memory of your graphics board. (Default is 0.)
[/size]
4.Edit your [color=yellow]skyrimprefs.ini[/color] and set the following values:
[size=4][Display]
[color=yellow]bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1
iMultiSample=0
bFXAAEnabled=0
iMaxAnisotropy=0[/color][/size]



[color=#00ff00][size=6][b]Uninstallation[/b][/size][/color]

Just delete any files from AIR ENB and d3d9.dll.

[img]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-XMZ_vEHaUjc/U8d7r0mUzeI/AAAAAAAABBw/MF4OORohkiU/w920-h518-no/ScreenShot5451.jpg[/img]


[b][color=#00ff00][size=6]Required Mod[/size][/color][/b]

[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65242/?]Purity by Laast[/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52423/?]Pure Weather by Laast[/url][/size]


[color=#00ff00][size=6][b]Highly Recommended Mod[/b][/size][/color]

[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59733/?]Enhanced[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59733/?] Lighting for ENB (ELE) - LITE by [b]--JawZ--[/b][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19933/?]Volrath Enhanced Lights and Fixes - VELF by _Volrath_[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13268/?]The Ruffled Feather - Mod Collection by [b]SparrowPrince[/b][/url][/size]

[img]https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-RyX4Rdqb_g0/U8d7skJPE5I/AAAAAAAABB0/JiIgDhxjLag/w920-h518-no/ScreenShot5561.jpg[/img]



[color=#00ff00][size=6][b]Credits[/b][/size][/color]

[size=4]Boris Vorontsov - [url=http://enbdev.com/]ENB Series [/url]developer
Zeroking - ULTIMATE SHADER ADDON for ENB 1.1
Based on Post-Process Effects Addon for ENB
Matso - enbeffectprepass.fx file
kingeric1992 - enblens.fx file
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24235/]Multiple Lens Sun Sprite Shader[/url] by Phinix
Sunsprite texture from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/newvegas/mods/53521/?]DYNAMO ENB by Courier[/url][/size]



[img]https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-BhTA4zLRukY/U8d5uYz8HAI/AAAAAAAAA-Y/PN0se44dtl0/w920-h518-no/%25E5%2586%2599%25E7%259C%259F+2014-07-15+14+35+31.jpg[/img]

I'm Japanese. Sorry,my English is not good enough.
author: HRK1025
